channel.title: Connection Accepted - But Yet They Arnt?
channel.description:
Well My Run Server Says Sometimes Connection Accepted - then ip
But It Doesnt Log Them In. It Only Places An Null On Server
Any Help?

item.title: Connection Accepted - But Yet They Arnt?
item.dc:creator: @nath22 nath22
item.description:
@nath22 wrote:

i had same problem like they will connect then disconnect and not be able to play
if this is whats happening it is your router as the NAT would be strict therefore blocking any connection from outside your area.
i had to buy a new router to fix (cause i didnt know how to change)
i think you need to contact your internet provider and ask them

Read full topic
item.source: Connection Accepted - But Yet They Arnt?
